description:
A responsive off-road shifter that leaves some coins to jingle in your pockets. The 2-way release accommodates different riding styles and positions, and lets you pull with your finger or push with your thumb.

  • 2-way release give you options for downshifting
  • For use with double or triple cranks
  • Shifter position is adjustable to your preference
  • Rapidfire Plus shift levers
  • Compact optical gear display
name: Shimano SLX SL-M7000-L Left 2/3 Speed Shifter
